name: HELP: The Illuminati captured my family and are forcing me to make this game
name_original: HELP: The Illuminati captured my family and are forcing me to make this game
description:
Help the brave, honorable, amazing, cool and handsome Illuminati save the earth from overpopulation! Love the Illuminati, they are just great, what friendly people, save me, they make great coffee, too.

Controls for Windows/HTML5:

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - Escape
  • Select - A
  • Deselect - S
  • Move cursor - Arrow keys
  • Advance text - A
  • Fullscreen (Windows) - CTRL+Return (text is a bit small, this might help)
  • Fullscreen (Web) - There's a small button

Controls for Dreamcast (and controller):

  • Return to game title -> menu -> collection title -> Exit game - A+B+X+Y+START (Standard Dreamcast return to title combo)
  • Select - A
  • Deselect - B
  • Move cursor - D-Pad or analog stick

Additional notes:

  • Original release date: 13/08/2018
  • Source code is on github: http://github.com/CaptainDreamcast/Help/
  • Twitter is here: http://twitter.com/CaptDreamcast

Thanks for playing!
